name: miton
description: Starter theme for WordPress based web apps

scripts.watch: node-sass assets/scss/ -o assets/css/ --source-map true --output-style compressed --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 -w
scripts.compile: node-sass assets/scss/ -o assets/css/ --source-map true --output-style compressed --indent-type tab --indent-width 1

author: Azamat Khodjakov
